dpr_compare_data_digest

dpr_compare_data_digest.Rd

A data digest comparison table, comparing the current data digest checksums with the current file checksums in the data directory.

Usage

dpr_compare_data_digest(path = ".")

Arguments

path

path to data package

Value

a data.frame with the file name, corresponding data in-memory checksum, existing data_digest checksum, and a boolean value indicating if they are same or not

Details

Compare the current checksums for the data listed in the data directory with the checksums listed in the data digest. The data digest is only updated when the package is built, not when it is simply rendered using dpr_render().

Author

jmtaylor

On this page

Developed by Jason Taylor.
